name: Short Circuit (CupCodeGamers)
description:
Short Circuit was previously released on Xbox 360, and is now available for your on-the-go play.

The object of the game? Turn all the buttons off, but as you select one button, all four buttons around it are also changed. Not enough challenge for you? Try the advanced mode that introduces 3 phase buttons that act as street lights.

Includes 35 classic levels, 35 advanced levels, and an infinite game mode that generates puzzles for you. Every puzzle is solvable.
